uHTTPManager Namespace

Summary

This is the main unit for managing everything.

Use only the interface uHTTPInterface|IHTTPManager for distribution (i.e. for COM compatible DLLs).

Classes
 NameDescription
THTTPManager

This is the base class, which handles the queued access for the HTTP-requests. Every GET/POST request gets a unique number. Through this you can check via HasResult(<UniqueID>) whether a specific request is full-filled or not. If the request is finished [i.e. HasResult(Double) = True], you can call GetResult(<UniqueID>) to access the HTTP-request result.

Be sure to create (using the Instance function) the class before you access it outside of your main application! You can customize (override) the internal constructor Create for your own needs (i.e. connect HTTP logging feature).
